name: ecommerce
description: API e-commerce that have two roles:['admin','customer'] #the guest can: -view products according to category -register an account -if he/she has an account they can directly log in and users roles are customers -only the admin user is beeing seed to the database #customer can: -all permissions of the guest are also available for customer -customer can create orders, update it or cancel it -make payments to his orders #Admin: -all permissions of customer are available for Admin -he can create and delete categories -create, delete, and update products that are offered to sell
